solution_line_template: Her new monthly bill will be ${usual_monthly_bill} * {increase_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator} = $<<{usual_monthly_bill}*{increase_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator}={new_monthly_bill}>>{new_monthly_bill}.
Her phone bill for the entire year will be ${new_monthly_bill} * {months_per_year} = $<<{new_monthly_bill}*{months_per_year}={annual_bill}>>{annual_bill}.
